content: I’d like to join the Content Brigade to help with proofreading and research. I have more than 20 years of professional writing and editing experience, and my current job also involves conducting extensive research on complex topics. I was unable to complete the application because it required me to submit a link to a social media account for content examples, and I don’t use social media. My interest in joining the team is to use my technical skills to assist the content developers.
Hey there!! If you try applying again try just typing in N/A for that question or attaching a resume to show your vast experience!!!
Great, yes, I had a similar question. I will do the same. It will be great have folks like <@1294460037267193913>.  Thanks, <@996999701461225473>.
